testcase.classname: To validate registration and signin functionalities of elearning page
testcase.name: To validate registration and send message functionalities
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to "http://elearningm1.upskills.in/index.php"..............passed And I click on SignUp button................................................passed And I enter value into input field First Name...............................passed And I enter value into input field Last Name................................passed And I enter value into input field email....................................passed And I enter value into input field Username.................................passed And I enter value into input field Password.................................passed And I enter value into input field Confirm Password.........................passed When I click on Register button.............................................passed Then I verify the message "Your personal settings have been registered."....passed And I click on user icon....................................................passed And I click on inbox link...................................................passed And I click on compose button...............................................passed And I enter value into input field Send To as "naveen"......................passed And I click on "naveen" in options list.....................................passed And I enter value into input field Subject..................................passed And I enter value into input field Message..................................passed When I click on submit button...............................................passed Then I should see success message as "The message has been sent to" and "naveen".passed
